Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Range 60 feet; Target 1 willing creature

Duration [[@actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] round(s)

You scream with a menacing roar, both psyching your target up and striking fear into their enemies. For a number of rounds equal to your Limit Rank, your target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects. Whenever your target hits or critically hits with a Strike while the Limit Break is active, they may attempt to [[/act demoralize]] the creature they hit and all other enemies within 10 feet of them as a free action, this attempt to Demoralize can use another skill instead of Intimidation if the target has a skill with a higher modifier.
